About Me

My Story

BIO

Hi there! Originally from Vancouver Canada, in 2018 I moved to Barcelona Spain and began my career as a junior full-stack web developer. I have a passion for learning, creating and building in a variety of languages. I especially enjoy working with JavaScript and JS frameworks such as Vue, Angular and React.

Outside of developing projects or exploring a new language I'm an avid fan of board games, rock climbing and exploring restaurants & pubs!

Ubiqum Coding Academy

Apr 2019 - Sept 2019: Full Stack Developer Participant

As a full-time participant in Ubiqum's programming academy I was focused on 5 major projects. Each project was handled with an AGILE methodology: First understanding the ask before dividing my work into a plan of attack of tasks that were outlined during daily stand-up meetings.

Projects were created using a variety of front-end and back-end languages and frameworks, starting with static HTML/CSS and working our way up to more complex requirements. See the My Work page for a closer look!
